timeline.bodyText: Please, do not use star import
timeline.author: mzueva
mzueva

timeline.bodyText: It seems to me that child classes of AbstractAzurePriceListLoader have almost identical code. The main difference is in the method getPricing. Is it possible to load prices from EA and RateCard in one format (e.g. make AzureEAPricingMeter and AzurePricingMeter to implement some common interface with all required methods getMeterId, etc.)? In this case we can have a small loader classes for EA and RateCard but keep all further processing in common code.
timeline.author: mzueva

timeline.message: issue #1556 refactor EA and RateCard loader to work with AzurePricingMeter interface
